channel.title: SML on MLOps - Practices
channel.description: Recent content in SML on MLOps - Practices

item.title: Standard ML notes
item.description: Basics Comments 1(* SML comment *) Variable bindings and Expressions 1val x = 34; 2(* static environment: x : int *) 3(* dynamic environment: x --> 34 *) 4val y = x + 1; 5 6(* Use tilde character instead of minus to reprsent negation *) 7val z = ~1; 8 9(* Integer Division *) 10val w = y div x Strings: 1(* `\n`のようなエスケープシーケンスが利用できる *) 2val x = "hello\n"; 3(* 文字列の連結には'^'を使う *) 4val y = "hello " ^ "world"; An ML program is a sequence of bindings.
